title: Blondy Is Brave
backCoverBlurb: Blondy is afraid of the dark. Join her as she discovers that being brave and confident can turn the scary night into a magical world of dreams.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy smile. She is wearing red pajamas with white stars.

pages.text: When the sun went down, Blondy felt a little bit scared.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy with curly blonde hair looking out at the darkening sky.

pages.text: The shadows in her room looked like giant monsters to her.
pages.imagePrompt: A shadow of a toy on the wall that looks like a friendly monster.

pages.text: Blondy hugged her teddy bear very tightly. I am brave, she whispered.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy hugging her brown teddy bear in her dimly lit room.

pages.text: She turned on her little nightlight. It glowed like a soft star.
pages.imagePrompt: A small star-shaped lamp glowing softly on a bedside table.

pages.text: Suddenly, the scary shadows became friendly shapes again.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy looking at her toys, now visible and comforting.

pages.text: The dark night was actually very calm and quiet.
pages.imagePrompt: The moon shining through the window onto Blondy's carpet.

pages.text: Blondy realized that she had nothing to fear after all.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy with a thoughtful and calm expression, blue eyes bright.

pages.text: She was a brave girl who could face the night with a smile.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy smiling confidently in her bed.

pages.text: Her room was a safe place full of happy memories and toys.
pages.imagePrompt: A view of Blondy's colorful room with books and blocks.

pages.text: The stars outside were like tiny lamps just for her.
pages.imagePrompt: A clear night sky with many twinkling stars.

pages.text: Blondy felt strong and confident as she closed her eyes.
Goodnight, brave Blondy. Sweet dreams in your magical room.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy sleeping soundly with her teddy bear.
